trait.name: Cleave
entries: When the ultralisk rolls to attack a creature, it also rolls to against all creatures within 5 ft. of the target other than the ultralisk.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The ultralisk deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ultralisk makes two attacks with its kaiser blades. It can use its gore or crush attack instead of its kaiser blades.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 21 ({@damage 2d12 + 8}) piercing damage. If the target is a large or smaller creature it must succeed on a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} by the ultralisk.

action.name: Kaiser Blades
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit 27 ({@damage 3d12 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one {@condition prone} creature. Hit 40 ({@damage 5d12 + 8}) bludgeoning damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained}. A creature can repeat this saving throw at the start of each of its turns. While the target is {@condition restrained}, the ultralisk is {@condition grappled}. (This attack does not gain the benefit of cleave.)

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The ultralisk makes one gore or kaiser blades attack.

legendary.name: Crush (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The ultralisk makes a stomp attack on a {@condition restrained} creature.
